Steps: 1) Navigate to Login; 2) Enter valid username/password; 3) Submit
Expected Result: User is authenticated and redirected to Start page

Steps: 1) Navigate to Login; 2) Enter invalid username/password; 3) Submit
Expected Result: Authentication fails with clear error message; no session created

Preconditions: User can authenticate; password policy configured
Steps: 1) Login; 2) Navigate to password change; 3) Enter current password and new valid password; 4) Save
Expected Result: Password updated; user prompted to re-authenticate if required

Steps: 1) Click Logout; 2) Confirm if prompted
Expected Result: Session cleared; redirected to Login; protected pages no longer accessible

Preconditions: User is logged in; short token lifetime configured
Steps: 1) Remain idle past token expiry; 2) Attempt navigation
Expected Result: User prompted to re-authenticate; no protected data shown

Steps: 1) Open sidebar; 2) Click each primary navigation item
Expected Result: Each link routes to the correct page without errors

Steps: 1) Login as limited user; 2) Inspect navigation
